about_the_game:
Duck's Hunt is a fast paced hardcore FPS game where you play as a bloodthirsty duck.

No health bars. No reloads. It’s just you and the gun you snatched from the enemy. One hit and you’re out. There are no convenient save points. When you die, you are back to the start of the level. Learn from your mistakes to achieve a flawless victory!

Alright, it's go-time! Grab the keys, jump in and take off for a quick spin around the neighborhood! Just a heads-up though the roads might be a little... unpredictable, shall we say so hold on tight and get ready for a bumpy, but fun ride.

Guns can fail, ammo can run out and sometimes, the only way to survive is to return to a more primitive method. When all else fails, engage in brutal melee combat and leave your enemies in the dust!

Forget subtle strategies, it's time for a full-blown, over-the-top pyrotechnic extravaganza! Turn every battlefield into a fireworks show! You’ll send your enemies flying with a blaze of glory, whether through a well-aimed rocket or an accidental chain of destruction.

Duck's Hunt Features:

Action-packed Levels - Dive into action-packed scenarios each filled with unique enemies and weapons. 

Diverse Arsenal - Use what you want whether that be traditional firearms, explosives or common household objects.

Interactable Objects - If you see it, you can use it in some way or the other.

Challenge Mode - Replay without saves, the bigger the risk greater the fun!

Endless Mode - Last as long as you can against waves of enemies.

Duck's Hunt offers players a unique gaming experience featuring a humorous single-player campaign and unconventional gameplay. The game's clear visuals help players focus on the gameplay and the action driven missions.

content_descriptors.notes: Players will encounter violence through combat and depictions of killing, which are presented with unrealistic blood but still maintain a sense of intensity. Some levels depict criminal activities such as arms trafficking, drug trafficking, and heists.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 or i5-6600
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 460 or GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600 or i5-13600
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 6600 XT or RTX 3060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 15 Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M4
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

name: Duck's Hunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 or i5-6600
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 460 or GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600 or i5-13600
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 6600 XT or RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Duck's Hunt is a fast paced FPS game where you play as a bloodthirsty duck. No health bars. No reloads. It’s just you and the gun you snatched from the enemy. One hit and you’re out. When you die, you are back to the start of the level. Learn from your mistakes to achieve a flawless victory!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
